unnormalised: Breaking news! Ms. Sharma, previously known as just a "Coordinator" at InfoTech Ltd., has been miraculously promoted to "Senior Executive VP of Synergies & Forward Integration" – a title so long, it barely fits on her business card! Sources say the promotion came after Ms. Sharma successfully navigated the office coffee machine crisis of '24.
normalised: Breaking news! Missus Sharma, previously known as just a "Coordinator" at InfoTech Limited, has been miraculously promoted to "Senior Executive V-P of Synergies and Forward Integration" – a title so long, it barely fits on her business card! Sources say the promotion came after Missus Sharma successfully navigated the office coffee machine crisis of twenty twenty four.

unnormalised: Our inside mole (who prefers to remain anonymous, naturally) revealed that the title change was less about actual responsibilities and more about HR’s attempt to boost employee morale. Apparently, calling someone a "VP of Forward Integration" sounds way cooler than "deals with the printer when it jams."

unnormalised: Industry analysts are baffled, with some joking that Ms. Sharma's new title is longer than InfoTech's actual profit margins.
